text: he eemaan vaalo! tum ban jao allaah (ke dharm) ke sahaayak, jaise maryam ke putr eesa ne havaariyon se kaha tha ki kaun mera sahaayak hai allaah (ke dharm ke prachaar mein)? to havaariyon ne kahaah ham hain allaah ke (dharm ke) sahaayak. to eemaan laaya israeeliyon ka ek samooh aur kufr kiya doosare samooh ne. to hamane samarthan diya unako, jo eemaan laaye, unake shatru ke virudhd, to vahee vijayee rahe
